content.user_title: Lead Quality Management for HealthTech Companies
content.value_statement: HealthTech and MedTech companies need comprehensive quality system oversight to maintain regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions. This skill provides a Senior Quality Manager (QMR) framework for quality system governance, regulatory compliance monitoring, and strategic quality leadership.
actual_capabilities: Establish quality management system governance frameworks aligned with ISO 13485 requirements
Monitor regulatory compliance across EU MDR 2017/745, FDA QSR 21 CFR 820, and ISO 13485
Lead management review processes with strategic quality planning and KPI development
Develop quality culture initiatives and quality leadership training programs
Oversee document control systems and change management processes
Manage regulatory authority relationships and inspection readiness programs
limitations: This skill provides frameworks and guidance, not legal or regulatory compliance verification
Does not execute actual quality management system audits or produce formal certification documents
Requires human review for final regulatory submissions and authority communications
Does not integrate with external quality management software systems

use_cases.title: Quality System Governance
use_cases.description: Establish comprehensive quality management system oversight aligned with international regulatory standards.

use_cases.title: Multi-Jurisdictional Compliance
use_cases.description: Track and maintain compliance status across EU MDR, FDA, and ISO 13485 requirements simultaneously.

use_cases.title: Strategic Quality Leadership
use_cases.description: Develop quality strategies and report quality performance metrics to senior leadership and boards.

prompt_templates.title: QMS Framework Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a quality management system governance framework for our MedTech startup including quality policy structure, responsibility matrix, and ISO 13485 compliance mapping.

prompt_templates.title: Compliance Monitoring
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a regulatory compliance monitoring system for our EU MDR 2017/745 and FDA 21 CFR 820 dual-market products including compliance gaps and remediation priorities.

prompt_templates.title: Management Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare a quarterly management review report template including quality KPIs, regulatory compliance status, audit findings summary, and strategic quality initiatives for C-level executives.

prompt_templates.title: Quality Culture Program
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a quality culture development program including quality awareness training curriculum, quality recognition programs, and employee engagement metrics.

output: Quarterly Management Review Agenda for Medical Device Company:

- Process effectiveness metrics and trend analysis
- Audit results and corrective action status
- Nonconformity and CAPA trends
2. Regulatory Compliance Status
- EU MDR compliance gaps and remediation progress
- FDA inspection readiness status
- ISO 13485 certification maintenance
3. Customer Feedback and Market Performance
- Customer satisfaction trends and complaints analysis

4. Strategic Quality Initiatives

best_practices: Link quality objectives to business strategy and measure progress quarterly with defined KPIs
Maintain documented evidence for all regulatory submissions and authority communications
Conduct regular management reviews with documented decisions and action items tracked to completion
anti_patterns: Treating quality management as a compliance checkbox exercise rather than a business improvement system
Waiting until regulatory audits to discover quality system gaps and deficiencies
Failing to involve senior leadership in quality culture development and accountability

faq.question: What is the difference between QMR and QA Manager roles?
faq.answer: QMR has organizational accountability for quality system effectiveness. QA Manager handles day-to-day quality operations and process implementation.

faq.question: How often should management reviews be conducted?
faq.answer: ISO 13485 requires management review at planned intervals. Quarterly reviews are standard practice for regulated medical device companies.

faq.question: What are the key FDA inspection readiness activities?
faq.answer: Mock inspections, documentation readiness reviews, training verification, and systematic gap analysis against FDA quality system regulation requirements.

faq.question: How do EU MDR and FDA QSR requirements differ?
faq.answer: EU MDR focuses on clinical evaluation and post-market surveillance. FDA QSR emphasizes design controls and process validation. Both require robust quality management systems.

faq.question: What KPIs should a medical device quality manager track?
faq.answer: Audit findings, CAPA cycle time, customer complaints, product nonconformities, training completion, and regulatory submission success rates.

faq.question: How do quality objectives align with business strategy?
faq.answer: Quality objectives should support business goals like market access, product reliability, customer satisfaction, and regulatory compliance across all product lines.
